name: Octoboom
description:
An accident has occurred in the mine and toxic gas is escaping! Flee! Your bomb is your weapon. Throw it on enemies, and catch it before it explodes. The longer you let it fly, the more points it’ll give you, but this is at your own risk.

Controls
  • Move : WASD or arrow keys (ZQSD on french keyboard layouts)
  • Aim : move mouse
  • Shoot : left click
  • Pause : escape
Credits
  • @Yolwoocle: code & art
  • @ArkanYota: code
  • @Notgoyome: code
  • Maxim: code
  • PoulpitoGLD: art
  • PierreAndries: music

Links to their Github/other accounts in the README from source code.

Source code: https://github.com/ARKANYOTA/ludumdare49

You could say our game is so buggy it fits the “Unstable” theme ;)
